title: Helen - EasterEggs / Pleasure Wheel / Flow – PLAZA ORB / viscal pleasure wheel intro
description: Viscal intro after WCW quest not taken

dialogueTree.english: You should return to the boardwalk once the body has been taken away. There's something you need to see.
dialogueTree.polish: Powinieneś wrócić na promenadę, kiedy ciało zostanie już zabrane. Jest coś, co musisz zobaczyć.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Ты павінен вярнуцца на праменад, калі цела ўжо забяруць. Ёсць нешта, што табе трэба ўбачыць.

links.english: Say no more! I'll go -- shrouded in total mystery.
links.polish: Nic nie mów! Pójdę. Owiany mgłą tajemnicy.
links.belarusian: Нічога не кажы! Пайду. Ахутаны таямніцай.

links.english: You can just stop by whenever you're close. It should be quick enough.
links.polish: Możesz po prostu tam wpaść, jak będziesz w okolicy. Nie powinno to długo zająć.
links.belarusian: Можаш проста туды зазірнуць, калі будзеш побач. Гэта не павінна заняць шмат часу.

links.english: Come on, I'm going to need more here.
links.belarusian: Ну, вазьміце, мне трэба больш інфармацыі.

links.english: A little something that your visual cortex has put together while you were busy solving the case.
links.polish: Mały drobiazg, który sklecił twój ośrodek wzrokowy, kiedy byłeś zajęty pracą nad śledztwem.
links.belarusian: Нязначная дробязь, якую стварыў твой зрокавы цэнтр, калі ты быў заняты працай над расследаваннем.

links.english: Let's call it an apparition from the past.
Oh no, it's one of those 'show, don't tell' things, isn't it?
links.polish: O nie, to jedna z tych rzeczy w stylu „pokaż, ale nic nie mów”, tak?
links.belarusian: О не, гэта адна з тых рэчаў у стылі "пакажы, але нічога не кажы", так?
